title: [100的地图搬运]Hearthveil Map
author: 壹佰佰佰
txt_content:
Hearthveil Map

——
镇楼图
——



——
介绍
（中文翻译）
——
这张地图一直是潘多拉的积木构建团队成员在最近的辛劳。它具有多种引人入胜的景点，包括飞鲸中，龙语飞艇，一个巨大的石魔像，还有更多


——
剧情
（中文翻译）
——
作为我们旅行的心灵滑倒下面站立忧患意识的，他的想法开始涉水。在sureal一阵，他是考虑到他的心灵深处，到他生命的核心。正是在这里，他的记忆是清晰，他的情绪日益成型。他的周围吃了一惊，他低声说了。 
“这是什么地方？”

微弱的跳动回答了他的脑海下沉思，释放他的惊讶。他痛苦，而现在没有了，他不担心，甚至不在乎“什么”我们的小小旅行是一个完整;陷入了沉思。



——
截图欣赏
——





































下载地址：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1i3FZwZ7

Tips：最好使用1.7.2以上版本游玩QAQ

——
介绍
(英文原文）
——
Presenting Hearthveil – Lost in thought

Hearthveil – Lost in thought has been the recent toil of the Pandora’s Blocks build team members. It features multiple fascinating attractions, including a flying whale, a draconic airship, a gigantic stone golem, and more…


——
剧情
（英文原文）
——
As our traveller’s mind slips below a standing of conciousness, his thoughts begin to wade. In a sureal burst he is taken into the depths of his mind, down to the core of his being. It is here where his true nature flourishes- his memories are clear and his emotions ever molding. Taken aback by his surroundings he whispers out.

“What is this place?”

A faint beating replies- his mind sinks deeper, releasing his concern, his pain. No longer does he worry or even care “what” our little traveller is to a completeness; Lost In Thought.
